name: Monster Hunt
description:
It’s you! The legendary invincible Monster Hunter! Help save the villagers from the evil cave monster! This game was developed as a mod on a game we where given at in the Sheridan College BA Game Design.

Arrow keys and space bar to move, jump and pickup villagers.

Pickup the villagers to carry them to safety at the castle.

The monster will bounce off-of you, and will be slowed by buildings.
